1370: Gheesen was born in Koe straet in 1370.
Got married to Ramont at age 14 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Gheesen in 1371 at age 15.
1372: Gave birth to Tetta in 1372 at age 16.
1373: Gave birth to Thedwi in 1373 at age 17.
1376: Gave birth to Dodo in 1376 at age 20.
1379: Gave birth to Woutgerus in 1379 at age 23.
1382: Lost son Woutgerus when Woutgerus was 4 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Nimme in 1383 at age 27.
1391: Lost daughter Thedwi when Thedwi was 19 years old.
Lost son Dodo when Dodo was 16 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1396: Lost daughter Nimme when Nimme was 14 years old.
